SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to identify house numbers, street signs, etc.?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IVIS - Identify House Numbers or Street Signs

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access dials, such as on stoves, thermostats, etc.?
Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access personal letters or notes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IVIS - Read or Access Personal Letters

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access printed materials, such as books, magazines, newspaper, etc.?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IVIS - Read or Access Printed Materials

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to watch television or identify faces from a distance?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IVIS - Watch TV or Identify Faces From Distance
